channel.title: Getting teleblock to work for ::saveme

item.title: Getting teleblock to work for ::saveme
item.dc:creator: @spleen15 spleen15
item.description:
@spleen15 wrote:

k ty[br][size=1]Posted on: February 19, 2007, 05:05:33 PM[/size][hr]wow only 2 errors

client.java:10698: '(' expected if teleblock() = false{ ^ client.java:11140: illegal start of expression } ^ 2 errors Press any key to continue . . .[br][size=1]Posted on: February 19, 2007, 05:07:09 PM[/size][hr]aint working o.O[br][size=1]Posted on: February 19, 2007, 05:13:33 PM[/size][hr]client.java:10704: ';' expected } ^ 1 error Press any key to continue . . .[br][size=1]Posted on: February 19, 2007, 05:17:15 PM[/size][hr]i got it to this with no errors:

else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("saveme")) if (teleblock = false){ teleportToX = 3212; teleportToY = 3423; sendMessage("you go to saveme."); if (teleblock = true){ sendMessage("your teleblocked."); } } but now if u arent tbed u cant telly :o[br][size=1]Posted on: February 19, 2007, 05:28:03 PM[/size][hr]nvm got it working! i used my mb lever code to help me out

Read full topic

well from looking at agents post ide say put this

else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("saveme")) if teleblock() = false{ teleportToX = 3212; teleportToY = 3423; }else{ sendMessage("you go to saveme.") if teleblock() = true{ sendMessage("your teleblocked.") } }
rofl it probly will not work ( i just messed around a bit with agents code )
i think i have it working in my server hang on

item.title: Getting teleblock to work for ::saveme
item.dc:creator: @Agent766 Agent766
item.description:
@Agent766 wrote:

Im not to sure. I tried doing this, but it may be something like:

else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("saveme")) if teleblock() = false{ teleportToX = 3212; teleportToY = 3423; }else{ sendMessage("A teleblock has been cast on you.") } }

I’m not to sure about the if teleblock() = false part. It may be 0 or something. Or it may be
if (teleblock = false){ or something.

item.title: Getting teleblock to work for ::saveme
item.dc:creator: @spleen15 spleen15
item.description:
@spleen15 wrote:

well my tb works for regular tellys but not ::saveme and things like that…how would i make it work?

my tb void is teleblock()

and my saveme command is:

else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("saveme")) { teleportToX = 3212; teleportToY = 3423; }

can sum1 please tell me what to do
